# `modern-sjtu-report`: SJTU Lab Report Template

![alt text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/StellarLane/modern-sjtu-report/main/thumbnail_github.png)

[Development Repository](https://github.com/StellarLane/modern-sjtu-report)

An **unofficial** Typst template for Shanghai Jiao Tong University course general laboratory reports.

## Usage
<!-- TODO Check the version number here -->

### Using VS Code

1. Install the [Tinymist Typst](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=myriad-dreamin.tinymist) extension.

2. Press `Ctrl + Shift + P` (Windows) or `Command + Shift + P` (MacOS) to open the Command Palette. Type `Typst: Initialize a New Typst Project based on a Template` and press Enter. Select `@preview/modern-sjtu-report:0.1.1`, choose an empty folder as your project directory, and you can start editing.

### Using the CLI

1. Download and install the [Typst Compiler](https://typst.app/open-source/#download).

2. Initialize the project using the command: `typst init @preview/modern-sjtu-report:0.1.1`.

### Using the Web App

1. Create a new project in the [Typst Web App](https://typst.app/), select `Start From Template`, and choose the `modern-sjtu-report` template.

### References & Acknowledgements

Referenced the Word version of the lab report template provided by the instructor of the `BME2305 Analog Circuits and Laboratory`.

Referenced parts of the styling from the [SJTU-Thesis](https://github.com/sjtug/SJTUThesis?tab=readme-ov-file) project.

Referenced parts of the styling from the [modern-sjtu-thesis](https://github.com/tzhtaylor/modern-sjtu-thesis) project.

Thanks you [@EveOfAugust](https://github.com/EveOfAugust) for providing lab reports as references.
